3: The bionics in this area... are much more violent than the others.
We're closing in on Amberia's position. Looks like the bionics have become more violent due to the data fragments.
Watch out! New embodiments have formed.
Seems like they don't want us getting any closer to the core.
Sorry... But we gotta put an end to this nightmare.
We'll be sure to wake you up this time, Amberia.
